titleInfo.title: Madame Louise Doussan en Compte Courant avec Son Agent, H.M. Favrot, 1865 Dec. 31

mods.abstract: A Civil War veteran and local public official in West Baton Rouge Parish, H.M. (Henri Mortimer) Favrot was the son of Augustine Eulalie Duplantier and Louis Favrot. A cousin of Louise Perrin Doussan, H.M. Favrot managed her interests in Louisiana beginning in the 1860s. Letter contains financial statements for Louise Doussan's assets managed by H.M. Favrot from October 1865 to December 1865.
mods.note: December 31, 1865, 'Madame Louise Doussan en Compte Courant avec Son Agent, H.M. Favrot.' Statements from October 1863 to December 1865.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.

Physical rights are retained by the LSU Libraries. Copyright has expired and the item is therefore in the public domain. Permission to reproduce this image must be requested through the Special Collections Division, Louisiana State University Libraries.
mods.note: Doussan Family Papers, Mss. 4800, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, Louisiana.
